body_html:
Hi alrojo,

Thanks for contributing! I'm starting to try your code on some real translation data (so there will be more comments).

For now, the first thing I noticed is perhaps to set the default value of encoder_projection to None & have check like:
if encoder_projection:
state = encoder_projection(initial_state, cell.output_size)
else:
state = initial_state
(Maybe you can throw some error if the size doesn't match).

-Thang

body:
Hi alrojo,

Thanks for contributing! I'm starting to try your code on some real translation data (so there will be more comments).

For now, the first thing I noticed is perhaps to set the default value of encoder_projection to None & have check like:
    if encoder_projection:
      state = encoder_projection(initial_state, cell.output_size)
    else:
      state = initial_state
(Maybe you can throw some error if the size doesn't match).

-Thang
